title: Apple macOS AMDRadeonX4000 Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Apple MacOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the fillUBMSurfaceInfoInternal function in AMDRadeonX4000.kext. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in a read past the end of an allocated data structure. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to escalate privileges and execute code in the context of the kernel.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT210348
timeline:
2019-07-25 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2019-09-10 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Lilang Wu and Moony Li of TrendMicro Mobile Security Research Team
